DocAttribute.Name: Name
DocAttribute.Documentation: The word, or group of words, by which the organization is referred to.

DocAttribute.Name: Description
DocAttribute.Documentation: Text that relates the nature of the organization.

DocAttribute.Name: Addresses
DocAttribute.Documentation: Postal and telecom addresses of an organization. > NOTE  There may be several addresses related to an organization.

DocAttribute.Name: IsRelatedBy
DocAttribute.Documentation: The inverse relationship for relationship RelatedOrganizations of IfcOrganizationRelationship.

DocAttribute.Name: Relates
DocAttribute.Documentation: The inverse relationship for relationship RelatingOrganization of IfcOrganizationRelationship.

DocAttribute.Name: Engages
DocAttribute.Documentation: Inverse relationship to IfcPersonAndOrganization relationships in which IfcOrganization is engaged.
